Introduction
This topic contains information on the notification and verification letters, including
independent verification
due process
compression letter
automatic generation of compressed letter
effective date of proposed action for the compressed letter
, and
attachments mailed with beneficiary letter
.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section C - Federal Tax Information (FTI) Match:  Post Award Audit (PAA) for Pension and Parents' Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) Beneficiaries
